content.raw:
This file gets installed, and is used by others to compile code against gazebo. `SearchForStuff` is used internally by gazebo for compilation. Try commenting out lines 192-194 and then compile a program that uses gazebo and ignition-transport, such as the example included in this pull request.

I changed this pull request to require ign-transport2 or ign-transport3.
content.html:
This file gets installed, and is used by others to compile code against gazebo. SearchForStuff is used internally by gazebo for compilation. Try commenting out lines 192-194 and then compile a program that uses gazebo and ignition-transport, such as the example included in this pull request.

I changed this pull request to require ign-transport2 or ign-transport3.
